items.headline: My friend, 61, signed a $20K contract for dental implants. She can’t afford it. Can she fight it?

items.headline: I’m about to inherit a lot of money. How do I make sure my husband doesn’t get any of it?

items.headline: ‘They knocked her down and started biting’: My mother, 84, was viciously attacked by her neighbor’s two dogs. Do we sue?
